      convert it to bigdecimal form source:http://rosettacode.org/wiki/Haversine_formula#Java ? Not converting to BigDecimal for performance concerns, This uses the ‘haversine’ formula to calculate the great-circle distance between two points – that is, the shortest distance over the earth’s surface – giving an ‘as-the-crow-flies’ distance between the points (ignoring any hills they fly over, of course!).
